response.overview: After a motorcycle accident shatters her world, Linda Neu finds a wellspring of strength in her deep and abiding love of horses. Medical teams are able to save her life, but not her leg – and Linda must navigate an untrodden path as she relearns to walk and finds new footing with the support of family, friends, and a high-tech prosthetic. Through it all, one goal sustains her: the pure joy of getting back on a horse. It's a different kind of ride – one of survival, new beginnings, and never giving up.
response.title: The Ride
